most_active_tickets.title: Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again

common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop App and Extension Errors
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various errors with the Pieces desktop app and Chrome extension, including blank message boxes, unresponsive behavior, and issues with specific features like code pasting and embed buttons. Troubleshooting steps include restarting the app and providing detailed bug reports with screenshots and system information. The Pieces team is actively investigating and addressing these issues.

related_issues.title: "Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
related_issues.text:
"Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When using LTM-2 to test the secret message example:
https://pieces.app/magic-moments/ltm

I got a strange response from the LLM:
Claude 3.5:
First Try:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1962a3e4-8b02-4d3f-bc8c-4bdd72c80aa6)
2. try: (waited longer on the website)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd71c5c1-d5d5-4449-acd5-e070fb244fa9)

Gemini 2.0 Flash did fail completely:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50735f7a-28a1-4563-b490-e10c271eca23)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation:

**Key Points Raised:**

* Users @hra42, @joelash, and @bartonfriedland reported encountering "basic mode due to device constraints" in PiecesOS on their M3 Macs.
* This mode caused issues with search functionality and agent updates.

**Problems Identified:**

* PiecesOS was incorrectly entering "basic mode" even on devices that supported vector search.
* This resulted in limited functionality, including:
    * Inability to use vector search.
    * No updates/rollups from the agent.
* Users were confused by the lack of information about "basic mode" in the documentation.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* A temporary fix was suggested: restarting PiecesOS.
* A permanent fix will be included in the next PiecesOS version.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The problem is acknowledged and a permanent fix is being worked on.
* In the meantime, users can avoid the issue by restarting PiecesOS.
* Issue closed after confirmation of the temporary fix.

**Additional Points:**

* The "Unknown Origin" issue reported by @bartonfriedland is not directly related to the "basic mode" issue but will be addressed separately.

### Early Access Program

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When copy paste code sencond time in Ask anything give error  this message is empty please try again
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary:

**Key Point:** Users amarranjan1 and veerendranath0312 are experiencing issues with the Pieces desktop app after an update.

**Problems:**
* Message box on desktop app is empty for amarranjan1.
* Veerendranath0312 is facing the same issue on the Mac version after updating to the latest version.

**Solutions:**
* No solutions are proposed or implemented within the conversation.

**Current Status/Outcome:**
* The Pieces support bot has triaged the issue and routed it to the appropriate team for follow-up within 24 hours.
* The bot also suggests some helpful resources: related issues list, app documentation, and Pieces YouTube channel.

**Additional Notes:**
* The user veerendranath0312 mentions the issue occurring after updating the app, indicating a potential bug.

related_issues.title: Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
related_issues.text:
Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

It fills this text endlessly...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b5edb10-b7cf-4fa6-a523-aa73af94cbee)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* Luceat-lux-vestra reported an issue with Pieces' embed buttons not working on a specific website.
* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the Pieces team.
* Rutvik-at-pieces requested PWE version and embed button status for debugging.

**Problems Identified:**

* Embed buttons were not working on a specific website.
* This issue may be related to embed buttons being enabled on the page, which was previously fixed by blacklisting the page.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Rutvik-at-pieces requested additional information for debugging the issue.
* The solution will likely involve verifying embed button status and potentially re-blacklisting the page.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue remains open and is awaiting further information from Luceat-lux-vestra.

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue was reported on March 9, 2025 and has not been resolved as of March 11, 2025.

*** 
**Please note:** This summary is based on the provided conversation and may not reflect all aspects of the issue.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Desktop App Errors
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various errors with Pieces OS and the desktop app, including empty message boxes, update failures, and issues with the Chrome extension.  Troubleshooting steps include checking for updates, antivirus software conflicts, and providing detailed bug reports to the Pieces support team.

related_issues.title: Pieces OS Update fails
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS Update fails
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The notification popped up saying an update was available so I clicked Update and a few seconds later got this message box:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b14dc8ab-632a-4095-b45b-7bbaba3c70ce)

This is on a very fresh Windows 11 installation.
## Summary of GitHub issue conversation

**Key Points:**

* **Issue:** PiecesOS on Windows fails to launch.
* **Possible Cause:** Bug in Windows App Installer.
* **Related Issues:**
    * PiecesOS was unable to launch (https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues/627)
    * PiecesOS was unable to launch (https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues/590)
* **Helpful Resources:**
    * Existing Issues: https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues
    * Documentation: https://docs.pieces.app
    * YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@getpieces

**Problems Identified:**

* App Installer might be outdated.
* Anti-virus software (Kaspersky) might be blocking PiecesOS from running.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Update App Installer through the Microsoft Store.
* Configure Kaspersky to allow PiecesOS to preform its processes.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue needs further investigation.
* Users are encouraged to follow the proposed solutions and report back on their success.

**Note:** The conversation excerpt provided ends on March 11, 2025. It's unclear if the issue was fully resolved after this date.

**Problems Identified:**

recommendations: **Investigate and address the root cause of errors with the Pieces desktop app and Chrome extension.** The most common issues reported involve blank message boxes, unresponsive behavior, and problems with code pasting and embed buttons. Resolving these issues should be a top priority.

**Improve communication with users regarding known issues and troubleshooting steps.** Providing clear and concise information about common errors, their potential causes, and recommended solutions can help reduce user frustration and support tickets.
**Enhance error reporting and logging mechanisms to capture more detailed information about issues.** This will help developers diagnose and fix bugs more efficiently.
**Consider implementing automated tests to catch regressions and ensure the stability of new releases.** This can help prevent similar issues from recurring in the future.

**Monitor user feedback closely and prioritize bug fixes and feature requests based on user impact and frequency.** This will ensure that the development team is addressing the most critical issues affecting users.
